mapper.select: SELECT query_text AS queryText, COUNT(1) AS hitCount FROM search_query_log WHERE query_text IS NOT NULL AND query_text <> '' GROUP BY query_text ORDER BY COUNT(1) DESC, MAX(created_at) DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT query_text AS queryText, MAX(created_at) AS lastTime FROM search_query_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND query_text IS NOT NULL AND query_text <> '' GROUP BY query_text ORDER BY MAX(created_at) DESC LIMIT #{limit}
